page.title: 11TRANSPORT-EYNSFORD A225
page.content: The A225 outside our school is always being repaired. So much heavy traffic uses it that the surface of the road needs renewing. The water and sewer pipes under the surface get shaken so badly that they fracture and have to be repaired. This June the road repair men fractured the water pipe leading into our school so we had to have the water turned off for the whole day. It was a nuisance especially for our school dinner ladies. Our vicar says that vibration from the lorries and cars is affecting the church. Lorries have even damaged the walls of houses in Eynsford. Lots of heavy goods vehicles come past also dumper trucks, oil tankers, tractors and coaches. We have even seen a car transporter.
